elements.title: RAKEL: ‘rescue remedy’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
RAKEL: ‘rescue remedy’

 Best New Music

RAKEL is steadily becoming a singular presence in the Icelandic soundscape. Her debut album a place to be is part diary and part landscape.

Aug. 8

elements.title: Desert Friends: ‘Sonora’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Desert Friends: ‘Sonora’

 Best New Music

On Friday, Aug. 8), KCRW DJ Tyler Boudreaux is throwing a summer boogie down for the ages.

Aug. 7

elements.title: Arc De Soleil: ‘Bina Tifa’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Arc De Soleil: ‘Bina Tifa’

 Best New Music

Arc De Soleil will put you in a trance with his swirling, cinematic sounds.

Aug. 6

elements.title: Thee Marloes: ‘I’d Be Lost’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Thee Marloes: ‘I’d Be Lost’

 Best New Music

Soulful Indonesian trio Thee Marloes are hard at work on their sophomore album for Big Crown records, but they still found the time to treat us to a gorgeous new seven inch single.“I’d…

Aug. 5

elements.title: Rochelle Jordan: ‘Through The Wall’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Rochelle Jordan: ‘Through The Wall’

 Best New Music

You likely know British-Canadian R&B artist Rochelle Jordan from “ Spit It Out ,” her recent collaboration with her friend Kaytranada.

Aug. 4

elements.title: Neko Case: ‘Wreck’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Neko Case: ‘Wreck’

 Best New Music

Singer-songwriter, author , and transcendent storyteller across all mediums— Neko Case —recently announced her first new music of the decade(!).

Aug. 1

elements.title: Fruit Bats: ‘Stuck In My Head Again’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Fruit Bats: ‘Stuck In My Head Again’

 Best New Music

We are so happy to report that 2000s indie rock darlings Fruit Bats have a new album on the horizon. Baby Man (due Sept. 12 via Merge) finds Fruit Bats’ main man Eric D.

Jul. 31

elements.title: Sofia Kourtesis: ‘Canela Pura’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Sofia Kourtesis: ‘Canela Pura’

 Best New Music

Peruvian producer Sofia Kourtesis hits us with a shot of sonic adrenaline (aka new single “Canela Pura”).
